mapper.insert: insert into orders values(#{no}, #{title}, #{description}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{destination},'shop'), AES_ENCRYPT( #{detailAddress}, 'shop'), #{postalCode}, #{requirement}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{phoneNumber}, 'shop'), AES_ENCRYPT( #{contact}, 'shop'), AES_ENCRYPT(#{email}, 'shop'), sha(#{password}), #{orderStatus}, now(), #{refundBank}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{refundAccount},'shop'), #{totalPrice}, #{deliverStatus}, #{deliverNumber}, #{trackingNumber}, #{completeDeliverDate}, AES_ENCRYPT(#{userId}, 'shop'))
mapper.select: select no, order_no as 'orderNo', title, order_status as 'orderStatus', order_date as 'orderDate', total_price as 'totalPrice' from orders where user_id = AES_ENCRYPT(#{userId},'shop')

select no, title, description, cast(AES_DECRYPT(destination, 'shop') as char) as 'destination', cast(AES_DECRYPT(detail_address, 'shop') as char) as 'detail_address', postal_code, requirement, cast(AES_DECRYPT(phone_number, 'shop') as char) as 'phone_number', cast(AES_DECRYPT(contact, 'shop') as char) as 'contact', cast(AES_DECRYPT(email, 'shop') as char) as 'email', cast(AES_DECRYPT(password, 'shop') as char) as 'password', order_status, order_date, refund_bank, cast(AES_DECRYPT(refund_account, 'shop') as char) as 'refund_account', total_price, deliver_status, delivery_fee, tracking_number, complete_deliver_date, user_id from orders where no = #{orderNo}

select a.order_no , a.displayed_product_no, a.amount, a.price, b.code, b.name, b.option, b.main_image_path, b.price as 'diplayed_product_price', b.product_no from shoppingmall.order_product a , shoppingmall.displayed_product b where a.displayed_product_no = b.no and order_no = #{orderNo}
